Requirements

You need a Java SDK (for example J2SE SDK 1.4, you can find it at http://www.javasoft.com) to be able to develop and run TAC agents using this AgentWare.

Getting the DummyAgent to run

There are brief documentation about a few of the important methods and callbacks in the header of the DummyAgent file.

Compiling

Type "make" to compile the AgentWare (and the DummyAgent) (or javac se/sics/tac/aw/*.java if you do not have make installed)

Running

Type "java se.sics.tac.aw.DummyAgent -agent agentname -password password" to run the DummyAgent (logging in as "agentname" with password "password"). If everything is all right the DummyAgent will connect to the server and a window showing the "internal" state of the agent will be shown. Note that if you are not running a server on your local machine you will also need to add the argument "-host ". The SICS TAC server is running at "tac.sics.se".

If you have any questions or comments regarding this AgentWare please contact tac-dev@sics.se or post a message at our forum.
